name: GCDeviceBattery
desc: The charge level and state of a device’s battery.

items.name: var batteryLevel: Float
items.desc: The charge level of a device’s battery.

items.name: var batteryState: GCDeviceBattery.State
items.desc: The state of a device’s battery.

items.name: enum GCDeviceBattery.State
items.desc: A state that indicates whether a device’s battery has power and is charging.
